The Ganges, you see, is not just a river; it's a symbol of our culture and spirituality. The program focuses on improving sewage infrastructure, promoting sustainable agricultural practices, and implementing solid waste management along the riverbanks. It also emphasizes the importance of public participation and awareness in preserving this lifeline of our nation.
